headline: Lt. Governor visits downtown Bellefontaine businesses
author: BELLEFONTAINE EXAMINER STAFF
sentences:
“The Lieutenant Governor has had a big hand in making Ohio one of the top 10 most affordable and business friendly states in the U.S. We’re excited to work more with Jon and his team helping many other towns and communities around Ohio, too.”

In addition to visiting with business owners, he highlighted his visit by throwing the ceremonial first axe ahead of the grand opening of Axe Ventura, the third premier axe throwing venue by owners Shannon and Anthony Taylor.

He also leads the Ohio Common Sense Initiative reviewing Ohio’s regulatory climate and InnovateOhio, a newly-created agency to coordinate data resources and technology services across the state government.

He stopped at businesses such as Small Nation’s coworking facility BUILD Cowork + Space, gourmet pizza restaurant Six Hundred Downtown, Four Acre Clothing Co., and restaurant/event venue The Syndicate.
